author: rhuijben
msg: Fix the lock handling in svn add --parents and switch some code to
more modern pool and dirent logic there. This to allow adding a write
lock test to svn_wc_add4() without breaking the tests.
(add_dir_recursive): Retrieve all dirents at once instead of opening the
dir to avoid some errors we noticed in different places. (Race conditions
on some BSD and network filesystems). Simplifying the code.
(add_parent_dirs): Obtain a lock if needed. Add note about how this code should

author: jim
msg: Allow for modules to keep track of worker slot
numbers themselves if they want, by allowing for
worker create/alloc functions to take a slot number id.
Done via _wid() variants of 3 proxy funcs.

author: linsun
msg: [message driven service]update service property names to use property names like remote service format

author: hlship
msg: TAP5-1197: Remove the Defense class and convert existing code to use Java's assert keyword
